# NSFontCollection.ActionTypeKey

**Structure**

The following actions are possible values of the [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSFontCollection/actionUserInfoKey] in the [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSFontCollection/didChangeNotification] `userInfo` method.

## Declaration

```swift
struct ActionTypeKey
```

## Action Key Types

- **shown**: The font collection was shown.
- **hidden**: The font collection was hidden.
- **renamed**: The font collection was renamed.

## Initializers

- **init(rawValue:)**

## Responding to Changes

- **didChangeNotification**: Posted whenever a font collection is changed.
- **NSFontCollection.UserInfoKey**: These constants are used as keys in the [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSFontCollection/didChangeNotification] `userInfo` dictionary to indicate the changes that have taken place.

## Conforms To

- Equatable
- Hashable
- RawRepresentable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
